name: Music_430.wav
keywords: ['new age song', 'guitar solo', 'tabla', 'vocables backing', 'bass', 'no vocal melody', 'angelic voice', 'relaxing song', 'slow tempo']
caption: This new age song features a guitar solo being played. This is accompanied by a tabla on the percussion. The bass plays the root notes of the chord with no flourishes and embellishments. An angelic voice sings vocables in the background. The voice does not sing any lyrics. The mood of this song is relaxing. This song can be played in a meditation center.
